text: Roger Bocquet (9 April 1921 - 10 March 1994)http://www.rotweiss.ch/bocquet- roger/ was a Swiss footballer during the 1940s and 1950s. He played as a half- back and was a participant at the 1950 FIFA World Cup and 1954 FIFA World Cup. He insisted on playing during the 1954 World Cup (and played all four matches) despite suffering from a brain tumour. He was later operated on and recovered. Bocquet won 48 caps for Switzerland in total and scored 2 goals. He played his club football for the Lausanne Sports Club.
